string.item: گھر میں داخل ہونے کی دعا
چھینک آنے کے وقت کی دعا

string.name: sub_headers
string.item: Dua For Morning - Subah Ki Dua
Dua Before Meals - Khane Se Pehle Ki Dua
Dua When Entering Home - Ghar Me Dakhil Hone Ki Dua
Dua Before Sleeping - Sote Waqt Ki Dua
Dua Upon Sneezing - Chink Aane Ke Waqt Ki Dua

string.name: contents
string.item: Practicing meditation and mindfulness will make you at least 10 percent happier. Being mindful doesn’t change the problems in your life, but mindfulness does help you respond to your problems rather than react to them. Mindfulness helps you realize that striving for success is fine as long as you accept that the outcome is outside your control.

The 10X Rule says that 1) you should set targets for yourself that are 10X greater than what you believe you can achieve and 2) you should take actions that are 10X greater than what you believe are necessary to achieve your goals. The biggest mistake most people make in life is not setting goals high enough. Taking massive action is the only way to fulfill your true potential.
